content: this cute little hat makes a great gift - the pattern is sized from baby to adult - and it s an ideal project to practise the magic loop technique **errata 19/2/13 the purl round from either side of the yo k2tog has been omitted work a purl round before and after this round to achieve the desired the result** **support** do you need help with this pattern we have a specific discussion thread 1 in the wormhead s hats group where you can ask any questions 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/topics/3514934
